activities: This privacy policy (“Privacy Policy”) addresses how ModSolar, LLC (“ModSolar”, “we”, “us”, “our”) collects, uses and discloses personal information about people who visit or use our software or services (“Customers”, “you”, “your”). We also collect and use personal information about your clients (“Clients”) while on our site at www.modsolar.net or using our software applications (collectively, the “Platform”). Access to and use of ModSolar Platform and the services provided by ModSolar (collectively, the “Services”) are subject to this Privacy Policy. The use of information collected through our Service shall be limited to the purpose of providing the Services for which each Customer has engaged ModSolar.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: name, email address, postal address, phone numbers, and other information that may identify our client. Providing of Personal Information is not compulsory
privacyprograms:
American Arbitration Association (ICDR®/AAA®). 

The ICDR®/AAA® provides international alternative dispute resolution (ADR) services for nationals from the EU and Switzerland pursuant to the U.S.-European Union (EU) and U.S.-Swiss Safe Harbor programs.
recoursemech: International alternative dispute resolution (ADR) services through American Arbitration Association (ICDR®/AAA® Safe Harbor program).
